alert.note: Alert for Interior Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 7:50PM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches for a storm total of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Interior Rockingham County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The potential exists for snowbands that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall, which will lead to rapid snow accumulations and hazardous travel conditions. Snow will change over to rain causing a period of slushy roads that will lead to extremely slick conditions. Plan on delaying travel to allow time for road conditions to improve. Heavy wet snow will cause weighted tree limbs, leading to snapped branches. Isolated to scattered outages possible. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
